page.title: 07The Shopping Centre cont.
page.content: all the buildings, this list gives a good idea of what there is in the central part. {Shops:}Supermarkets(3) Butchers(4) Fishshop(l) Bakers(l) Chemists(2) Newsagents(3) Shoes(2) Wool(l) Crafts(3) Books (l) Toys(l) Sweets(l)Hardware(2) Jewellers(l) Antiques(2) Furniture(l) Pets(l) Off-Licence(l) Dry-Cleaners(l) {Other Buildings:}Post Office(l) Vets(l) Hairdressers(2) Dentists(l) Banks(6) Building Societies(3) Estate Agents(2) Churches(l) Hotels (3) Pubs(5) Betting Offices(2) Cafes(5) Toilets, Bingo Hall, Gymnasium, Employment Office {Questionnaires:}We spoke to 34 people in the market square: l6 lived in Thirsk or Sowerby,7 lived in nearby towns and villages,2 lived abroad and 9 lived in southern England.
